General.Name: New York Health Care Inc
General.Description: New York Health Care, Inc. operates as a home care services agency primarily in New York. The company offers various home care services, such as companionship services, homemaker/housekeeper staff, professional and practical nurses, home health aides, care givers, geriatric care, and dementia and alzheimer care services. It also provides insurance services. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Valley Stream, New York.
General.Address: 33 West Hawthorne Avenue, Valley Stream, NY, United States, 11580
